content:
FOR SALE
Clean, well maintained, 2nd owner, everything in working condition. Never lived in full time and haven’t travelled with pets. Recent maintenance includes: roof resealed, engine tune up and new batteries (two 6v, one 12v). Have book of receipts for all maintenance and all manuals. Come take a look, you will not be disappointed.
Accessories include:
 Onan 5500 generator 2 slides 2 A/C units HD TV leveling jacks backup camera banks power exhaust steering stabilizer tire pressure sensors solar (small) electric awning full size RV cover and tire covers  Graphics faded and cracking. Paint in good condition. Tires have no weather or storage damage, lots of tread and always protected with tire covers. Transmission, drivetrain and brakes in great condition. Clean title, current CA registration.
Mike
 call or Text 925-286-6648   Click ANY image to load photo swipe carousel

content:
My book list.
But What If We’re Wrong? Thinking About the Present as If It Were the Past By: Chuck Klosterman  The Chaos Imperative How Chance and Disruption Increase Innovation, Effectiveness, and Success By: Ori Brafman, Judah Pollack  Measure What Matters How Google, Bono, and the Gates Foundation Rock the World with OKRs By: John Doerr, Larry Page - foreword  The Upstarts How Uber, Airbnb, and the Killer Companies of the New Silicon Valley Are Changing the World By: Brad Stone  It Doesn’t Have to Be Crazy at Work By: Jason Fried, David Heinemeier Hansson  Quiet The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking By: Susan Cain  Creativity, Inc. Overcoming the Unseen Forces That Stand in the Way of True Inspiration By: Ed Catmull, Amy Wallace  Grit The Power of Passion and Perseverance By: Angela Duckworth  The Happiness Advantage The Seven Principles of Positive Psychology That Fuel Success and Performance at Work By: Shawn Achor  Brotopia Breaking Up the Boys’ Club of Silicon Valley By: Emily Chang  Mindset The New Psychology of Success By: Carol Dweck  The Outsiders Eight Unconventional CEOs and Their Radically Rational Blueprint for Success By: Patrick Lencioni  The Five Dysfunctions of a Team A Leadership Fable By: Patrick Lencioni  The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life By: Mark Manson  Tribes We Need You to Lead Us By: Seth Godin  Immunity to Change How to Overcome It and Unlock the Potential in Yourself and Your Organization By: Robert Kegan, Lisa Laskow Lahey  The Better Angels of Our Nature Why Violence Has Declined By: Steven Pinker
